title: Add self-healing transcript file detection to watcher
description:
The transcript watcher can get stuck tailing a stale transcript file when a new Claude session starts. Add periodic checking so the watcher detects newer .jsonl files in the transcript directory and switches to them automatically.

Approach:
- In the watcher's main loop, periodically check if a newer .jsonl file exists
- If found, switch to tailing the new file
- Log the switchover

actions.note: Replaced tail -f pipe with polling loop that checks for new lines every 1s and for newer transcript files every 10s. Handles file truncation, logs switchovers. Restarted watcher with updated script.
